Package org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap

esup-commons LDAP features.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BasicLdapService The interface of LDAP services for any entity.
LdapEntity A LDAP entity, as returned by LDAP searches.
LdapEntityService The interface of LDAP services for any entity.
LdapGroup A LDAP group, as returned by LDAP searches.
LdapGroupService The interface of LDAP group services.
LdapUser A LDAP user, as returned by LDAP searches.
LdapUserAndGroupService The interface of LDAP user services.
LdapUserService The interface of LDAP user services.
WriteableLdapUserService The interface of writeable LDAP user services.
 

Class Summary
AbstractLdapService An abstract class that implements interface LdapUserService.
CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl Class which enable to add a cache to LDAP query, In order to improve execution time.
LdapAttributesMapper Class which allows to retrieve user attributes from a LDAP directory.
LdapEntityImpl A basic implementation of LdapEntity.
LdapGroupImpl A basic implementation of LdapGroup.
LdapSchema Store LDAP attributes names.
LdapUserImpl A basic implementation of LdapUser.
LdapUtils A class that provides utilities to access LDAP.
MultiUrlLdapContextSource A class to allow the usage of simple or multiple LDAP URLs.
OfflineLdapUserServiceImpl An implementation of LdapUserService to work offline.
SearchableLdapGroupServiceImpl An implementation of LdapGroupService that delegates to a CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl.
SearchableLdapUserAndGroupServiceImpl An implementation of LdapUserAndGroupService that delegates to two instances of CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl.
SearchableLdapUserServiceImpl An implementation of LdapUserService that delegates to a CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl.
SimpleLdapEntityServiceImpl An implementation of LdapEntityService based on LdapTemplate.
StringFilter A LdapTemplate filter, build with a string (that represents an already-encoded filter).
WriteableLdapUserServiceImpl An implementation of WriteableLdapService based on LdapTemplate.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidLdapAccountException An exception thrown when failing to retrieve a user from a datasource.
LdapAttributesModificationException An exception thrown when failing to retrieve a user from a datasource.
LdapBadFilterException This exception is thrown when using a bad LDAP filter.
LdapBindFailedException An exception thrown when failing to bind to an LDAP directory due to some wrong credentials.
LdapConnectionException This exception is thrown when the connection to LDAP fails.
LdapException An abstract class for exceptions while performing LDAP operations.
LdapMiscException This exception is used to wrap unexpected exceptions thrown by LDAP operations.
NotUniqueLdapAccountException A class to represent the exceptions thrown when expected objects do not exists (either retrieved from the database or configuration files).
 

Package org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap Description

esup-commons LDAP features.
